text: God mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam Atrivim Nekon akamɨn Josaia ganɨngizɨ an a baregha, mɨdorozim bagha bar ifuegha bar otoke. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Isipia deragh an gan a gɨfofoghan koghasa, an atrivir korotiam suegha, korotiar igharazim aru. Egha a uan mɨdorozir gumaziba inigha mɨsoghasa Megidon danganir zarim giraghugha, Isipia ko mɨsosi.
